Looking for a T206 Wagner (Bat on right) in grade 2 or 3.

If anyone has one for sale or trade, please PM me.
This could have been interesting had you said Honus... :). Good luck with the search

I have a SGC 30 Wagner if you are interested.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url]   Thanks, Bill
